system.effect: While Stationary, allows up to 4 vessels to dock to this one. This vessel acts as a space station for purposes of making Full Repairs or replenshing Morale. +10 to Acquisition Tests when making full repairs and +100 Achievement Points towards Trade Objectives. Ships with this component cannot use "Broadside" Weapons. Only one per vessel.
